data1.Desc: The Mattermost application does not work (the '502 Server is Down' error) after installing from the platform Marketplace
Outdated repositories are listed in the old tags of the NGINX-based nodes

data2.Desc: An error occurs during environment creation
An error occurs when executing scripts via launcher on the GlassFish nodes
Incorrect PaaS version value in the downloadable OpenAPI files
Custom environment variables are not set on the images based on the alpine OS template
